111.content:
You knew Kluke liked her boots a lot, so hiding as one would be perfect. By the time you got back, it was pretty dark out. You noticed that Kluke and Zola were alone by a campfire. You quietly got behind them and transformed into Kluke's right boot. Once you were done changing, the whole situation felt weird. Kluke and Zola towered over you. You also couldn't speak, since you didn't have a mouth. You listened to their conversation.

"I can't wait until our break tomorrow. It'll just be you, me and Bouquet for a few days. We won't have to worry about problems at all." Zola said. Kluke nodded then suddenly noticed you. She walked over to you and picked you up, she had a gorgeous face,

"Huh? I don't recognize this boot." Kluke said. She typically only had one pair, so seeing another boot surprised her.

"Strange, . . . It just appeared out of nowhere." Zola said, looking at you. You were a little worried about what the girls were about to do with you now.

"Here, let me try it on." Kluke said smiling. She sat down and replaced her right boot with you. It felt weird having Kluke's foot in you, but you suddenly started to feel satisfied. "Wow, it's really comfy, and it's just my size." Kluke was very happy, and you felt nice being with her this close.

"What will you do with the other one?" Zola asked.

"I'll keep it, just in case, but I'll probably be wearing this one for most of the time." Kluke said. She then . . .
111.title: A foot closer to Kluke

112.content:
You get excited about the possibilities, then decide to transform into something for Zola. You leave and find her relaxing in a pool with Bouquet You are able to see her shorts on the ground, and she's faced away right now. You quietly walk up and take them, bringing them back to camp. You put them in her bag and go back, ready for some fun. The two girls still aren't paying attention, making it easy for you to get behind them and transform into Zola's shorts. Unfortunately, you have to wait half an hour before they get done.

"That was fun, but I think it's time to head back." Zola said, making you excited. You watch her sexy body step out of the water and walk towards you. You hadn't realized how tall she would be compared to you, she was taller than anything you had seen. Both girls take off their swimsuits and start to dry themselves. Seeing them in their birthday suits made you blush, if you could in this state. Once they get dry, they start changing into their normal clothes. A weird feeling goes through you as you feel Zola's hand grab you. She slips you right on and puts her belt over you. Suddenly, she frowns.

"What's wrong?" Bouquet asked.

"I don't know why, but these feel a little weird." Zola responded, referring to you.

"Here, let me feel them." Bouquet said, putting her hands on Zola/you. You couldn't believe that within five minutes, two girls were interested in you, in a way. Zola blushed and tried to push her away. "You're right, they are strange." Bouquet said after backing up. Zola thought for a minute before saying . . .

13.content:
Your name is Chris and you live in a small town on an island. Your town is pretty well known for fishing. Most people who grew up in your town fished. You hoped you could be good at fishing one day, maybe even be a famous fisherman. Besides hearing stories of catching big fish though, nothing exciting ever happened. Your friends weren't fighters, and there weren't many who traveled far enough to hear tales. For this reason, you were typically bored, practicing fishing with no luck. However, there was one other thing on your island that was pretty well known, the temple. It's said that the temple held a powerful item, but it's also said that whoever tries to use it's power will become cursed.

One day, you decided to ignore the warnings. After all, it couldn't be that bad… right? Once it became nightfall, you snuck out and went to the temple. Despite the fact that a powerful relic was in there, no one was guarding it. You always found this weird. You stepped into the dark building. From the outside, it was big and mighty, but inside, the place had been worn down, abandoned. There were cracks in the walls and vines hanging from the ceiling. You went down some stairs, going in deeper. The sounds grew ominous. You were debating whether to go back or not when you saw a glowing blue sphere. As you stepped closer, you had a strange feeling inside. You stepped up to it, unsure of what to do. You didn't want to be cursed, but it was like the orb was calling to you. After a moment, you grabbed it, making it glow brighter. The light shined brightly, before making you pass out.

When you woke up, your head was dizzy. You couldn't feel your limbs at all. You were about to look around when you heard a voice.

"It's too bad we didn't find the relic at the temple. It could have been useful to us. At least there was something." A woman said. After a minute of looking around you realized you were…
13.title: The ancient artifact

She moves under the covers dimming the light a lot, it seemed like the afternoon, she probably came back from a long day, she reaches down and pulls up her pink skirt for you and you alone.

(Kluke's perspective)'I cannot believe that guy forgot about me as if I was trash, I'll show him, just he wait!!! I can't take anymore!' I walk over to my drawer and grab it, my body trembles as I can't control myself, stumbling over to my bed I fall onto it and get underneath the warm blanket and soon after I reach my skirt up for the toy and then I relieve myself by pushing in deep, it felt so good to feel the arousing movement underneath my covers, I sort of cried thinking about how I may never feel this for real anymore so I try to forget it by getting lost in my own thoughts.

The movements were too much as I reached into her womanhood, and much deeper than that, I was trapped in a lovely maidens enjoyment as she enjoys my restriction of movement, every part of me tried to deny this, my pride was heavily on the line, I then realized I would have to wait an hour before I could change. info.description:
in this one you are given the power to summon a shadow that can transform you into anything you want and that includes shrinking down to almost anything and growing other people
rule 1 no guys except you
rule 2 kepp the main character hidden for a lot of chapters or transformed
rule 3 while transformed the character will be used like the object he transformed ex: if he transforms into a underwear then they will think he is underwear
rule 4 yuri is allowed
rule 5 he can be anything but he must stay in that form for a minimum of 1hour
rule 6 he can transform from one thing to another without turning back to a human
rule 7 sex is allowed
